casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Karlos Antonio HOLMES No. 28P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Holmes, Karlos Antonio Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender Isham F. Hicks, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 18th of January 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
